General.Name: Affinity Beverage Group Inc
General.Description: Affinity Beverage Group, Inc. focuses on the provision of consumer products in the health and wellness sector. The company, through its subsidiary, Village Tea Company Distribution, Inc., provides loose leaf tea and accessories under the Village Tea brand for retailers in North America, as well as through e-commerce retailers and its Website villageteaco.com; and sweeteners under the Pura Organic Agave brand. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Sarasota, Florida.
General.Address: 1700 Prospect Street, Sarasota, FL, United States, 34239
